name: Broken Access Control
prevention_pattern: Enforce 'Deny by Default'. Implement RBAC/ABAC middleware globally. Use Policy-as-Code for complex logic.
2025_standard: Chuyển dịch sang ABAC (Attribute-Based Access Control) để linh hoạt hơn. Không tin tưởng ID từ client (Insecure Direct Object References).
checklist_item: Are API endpoints protected by default? Is resource ownership checked before access?

name: Injection (SQL/Command)
prevention_pattern: Use ORM/Query Builders (Prisma/TypeORM/SQLx). NEVER string concat SQL. Validate inputs with Zod/Pydantic.
2025_standard: Sử dụng Type-Safe SQL (như sqlx trong Rust hoặc jOOQ trong Java) để check query lúc compile-time.
checklist_item: Are strictly parameterized queries used? Is input validation applied at the edge?

name: Cryptographic Failures
prevention_pattern: Encrypt sensitive data at rest (AES-256). Use TLS 1.3 only. Never hardcode keys.
2025_standard: Chuẩn bị cho 'Post-Quantum Cryptography' (PQC). Rotate keys tự động mỗi 90 ngày.
checklist_item: Is data encrypted at rest and in transit? Are keys managed by a KMS/Vault?

name: Vulnerable Dependencies
prevention_pattern: Automate Dependency Scanning in CI/CD. Generate SBOM (Software Bill of Materials).
2025_standard: Bắt buộc ký (Signing) container images và artifacts (Cosign/Sigstore) để chống giả mạo.
checklist_item: Is SBOM generated? Are container images signed?

name: Authentication Failures
prevention_pattern: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA). Disable sessions after inactivity. Rate Limit login attempts.
2025_standard: Chuẩn OAuth 2.1. Sử dụng Passkeys (WebAuthn) thay cho mật khẩu truyền thống nếu có thể.
checklist_item: Is MFA enforced for admin? Are sessions invalidated on logout?

name: Security Misconfiguration
prevention_pattern: Infrastructure as Code (IaC) scanning. Disable default accounts/ports. Remove debug endpoints.
2025_standard: GitOps workflow để quản lý cấu hình. Không SSH trực tiếp vào server (Immutable Infrastructure).
checklist_item: Is debug mode disabled in Prod? Are default passwords changed?

name: Server-Side Request Forgery
prevention_pattern: Validate & Whitelist target URLs. Network segmentation (Service Mesh). Don't allow loopback access.
2025_standard: Sử dụng Egress Filtering chặt chẽ trong Kubernetes (chỉ cho phép gọi ra các domain định trước).
checklist_item: Does the server validate user-supplied URLs? Is access to internal metadata blocked?

name: Logging & Monitoring Failures
prevention_pattern: Centralized Logging (ELK/Loki). Audit sensitive actions. Ensure logs don't contain PII/Secrets.
2025_standard: Log ở format JSON cấu trúc (Structured Logging) để dễ dàng tích hợp với SIEM/AI Analysis.
checklist_item: Are critical actions (login/failed access) logged? Is PII redacted from logs?

name: Secrets Management
prevention_pattern: Inject secrets at runtime via Volume/Env. NO secrets in Git. Use External Secrets Operator.
tooling_ref: External Secrets Operator | Infisical | AWS Secrets Manager
2025_standard: Ngừng dùng.env file trong production container. Dùng cơ chế 'Dynamic Secrets' của Vault.
checklist_item: Are secrets stored in Git? Are secrets injected securely at runtime?

name: API Security (Broken Object Level Auth)
prevention_pattern: Validate schema on every request/response. Use API Gateway for throttling/auth.
2025_standard: Áp dụng 'Schema Validation' chặt chẽ (OpenAPI/Swagger) tại Gateway trước khi request vào Service.
checklist_item: Is API traffic rate-limited? Are IDORs checked in every handler?

name: Container Security
prevention_pattern: Run as non-root user. Use minimal base images (Distroless/Alpine). Read-only root filesystem.
2025_standard: Sử dụng 'Distroless' images để giảm bề mặt tấn công (không shell
column9: Does the container run as root? Is the base image minimal/distroless?

name: Denial of Service (DoS)
prevention_pattern: Implement Rate Limiting (Token Bucket). Set timeouts for all upstream calls. Circuit Breakers.
2025_standard: Triển khai Rate Limiting phân tán (Distributed Rate Limiting) và Adaptive Throttling.
checklist_item: Are timeouts configured for DB/API calls? Is rate limiting active?

name: Data Privacy (GDPR/CCPA)
prevention_pattern: Data Minimization. Right to be Forgotten (Soft delete vs Hard delete). PII masking.
2025_standard: Hỗ trợ 'Data Residency' (lưu dữ liệu đúng vùng địa lý) và 'Column-level Encryption' cho PII.
checklist_item: Is user consent tracked? Can user data be completely deleted?

name: GraphQL Security
prevention_pattern: Query Depth Limiting. Disable Introspection in Prod. Complexity Analysis.
2025_standard: Chặn 'Cyclic Queries'. Sử dụng Persisted Queries để tránh injection query độc hại.
checklist_item: Is Introspection disabled? Is Query Depth limited?
